sections.education: bachelor of business administration : accounting , 12/2014 valdosta state university - city gpa: 3.7
sections.summary: financial and accounting professional with expertise in financial analysis, audit, compliance, financial accounting, forecasting, budgeting, and procurement in the healthcare industry. strong working knowledge of gaap, fasb, sox, and asc 606 procedures. exceptional analytical ability and problem-solving skills, analysis and solutions of complex problems in conjunction with managing financial outputs, managing teams to achieve defined outcomes with over 15 years' experience in a variety of organizational roles. advanced knowledge of microsoft toolsets. results oriented with proven track record of quick learning ability, increased responsibilities and rapid advancement. highlights power user of microsoft excel epicor netsuite quickbooks hyperion great plains sage intacct credit, therapy accounting, hyperion crm, validation accountant, insurance client ad, inventory clients auditing, leadership database trial balance, microsoft excel database management balance sheet, excel finance monthly bank reconciliations, payroll financial banking, process payroll financial audits benefits, procurement financial planning and analysis bookkeeping, proposal financial statement preparation budgets, quickbooks financial statements budget, relational database prepare financial statements bi, reporting funds c, revenue recognition general ledger community health, sage gl compliance audits, sales great plains contract management, tax home health contracts, taxes hospice cpa, tax returns human resource
